title: [已解决]已构建好的1.7.2mod开发环境不能通过Eclipse打开
author: j1846621493
txt_content:
操作系统：Windows 8.1 X64
java版本：1.7.0_80
Forge版本：forge-1.7.2-10.12.2.114
使用gradlew构建

在我使用gradlew构建完成后，通过Eclipse运行
在[21:27:33]报错

[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.2.217.1147 for Minecraft 1.7.2 loading
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.7.0_80, running on Windows 8.1:amd64:6.3, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre7
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [FML]: Managed to load a deobfuscated Minecraft name- we are in a deobfuscated environment. Skipping runtime deobfuscation
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[21:27:30] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager$FMLPluginWrapper
[21:27:30] [main/ERROR] [FML]: The binary patch set is missing. Either you are in a development environment, or things are not going to work!
[21:27:32] [main/ERROR] [FML]: The minecraft jar file:/C:/Users/Administrator/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.2-10.12.2.1147/forgeSrc-1.7.2-10.12.2.1147.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class appears to be corrupt! There has been CRITICAL TAMPERING WITH MINECRAFT, it is highly unlikely minecraft will work! STOP NOW, get a clean copy and try again!
[21:27:32] [main/ERROR] [FML]: FML has been ordered to ignore the invalid or missing minecraft certificate. This is very likely to cause a problem!
[21:27:32] [main/ERROR] [FML]: Technical information: ClientBrandRetriever was at jar:file:/C:/Users/Administrator/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.7.2-10.12.2.1147/forgeSrc-1.7.2-10.12.2.1147.jar!/net/minecraft/client/ClientBrandRetriever.class, there were 0 certificates for it
[21:27:32] [main/ERROR] [FML]: FML appears to be missing any signature data. This is not a good thing
[21:27:32] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager$FMLPluginWrapper
[21:27:32] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[21:27:33] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Launching wrapped minecraft {net.minecraft.client.main.Main}
[21:27:33] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method) ~[?:1.7.0_80]
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57) ~[?:1.7.0_80]
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43) ~[?:1.7.0_80]
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606) ~[?:1.7.0_80]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:134) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
Caused by: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no lwjgl in java.library.path
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(ClassLoader.java:1886) ~[?:1.7.0_80]
        at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:849) ~[?:1.7.0_80]
        at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:1088) ~[?:1.7.0_80]
        at org.lwjgl.Sys$1.run(Sys.java:73) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ~[?:1.7.0_80]
        at org.lwjgl.Sys.doLoadLibrary(Sys.java:66) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.Sys.loadLibrary(Sys.java:95) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.Sys.<clinit>(Sys.java:112) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.getSystemTime(Minecraft.java:2674) ~[Minecraft.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(Main.java:40) ~[Main.class:?]
        ... 6 more




解决方法:将“lwjgl.dll”和“lwjgl64.dll”文件粘贴到 jre 所在目录的“\bin”中，我的jre目录是“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7”。

文件：



附件.zip
(177.28 KB, 下载次数: 8)



2017-2-20 20:45 上传
点击文件名下载附件







新人发言，以上是我的个人经验（找了一天）
原帖地址：http://www.minecraftforge.net/forum/topic/24935-172-solved-cannot-run-minecraft-client-through-eclipse/（文件是我找的）

replies.author: syn614211648
replies.txt_content:
楼主构建指令是什么？
在 setup之后还需要输入 
gradlew eclipse复制代码
才能将eclipse文件夹作为工作空间

replies.author: syn614211648
replies.txt_content: 顺便一提 ， 不推荐开发1.7.2 mod了, 1.7.10即使占很大分量也即将过时. 请照4z佬学习1.8+ ( 1.8也过时了.鄙人开发环境为1.11)
